backend/main.mo: Entry point for the Motoko backend actor that composes blob storage functionality via the MixinStorage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two hero section improvements—strengthened overlay contrast and removal of the animated scroll indicator—to their implementing file and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-line summaries of each frontend source file for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file that defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, setting the page title to 'Alexander Green – Worlds Hub' and mounting the app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles the full landing page by rendering Header, HeroSection, WorldsSection, AboutSection, and Footer in sequence.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Two-column about section displaying the author portrait with decorative frames and a personal bio introducing Alexander Green's four fantasy worlds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Dark-themed footer with author branding, smooth-scroll world and page navigation links, copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed navigation header with the author logo, desktop anchor links, scroll-aware background styling, and a collapsible mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-viewport hero section with a strong dark gradient overlay and side vignette for text legibility, drop-shadowed copy, CTA buttons, and a static (non-animated) scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/WorldsSection.ts: Defines and renders a 'Worlds Showcase' section with four fantasy world cards (Mythica, The Scar Queen, The Chitin Realms, Skyline), each displaying an image, badge, title, tagline, description, and an external link button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing login/logout state via DFINITY's AuthClient and exposing identity, login status, and helper flags to child components.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts (Cinzel, Crimson Text, Inter), sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, and defines a dark fantasy OKLCH color palette via CSS custom properties for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom fantasy design tokens (gold, crimson, ink, parchment colors), serif/display font families, OKLCH-based semantic color variables, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the landing page for author Alexander Green, tracking existing features, known issues (hero contrast and animation), architectural notes, and versioning for the build planner.
